// SPDX-License-Identifier: UNLICENSED
 
pragma solidity 0.8.0;
 
library FunctionUtils {
	/// @notice Pure function to compute the value of a linear by part function
	/// @param x point of the function we want to compute
	/// @param X list of breaking points
	/// @param Y list of values at breaking points
	function piecewiseLinear(
		uint256 x,
		uint256[] memory X,
		uint256[] memory Y
	) internal pure returns (uint256 y) {
		if (x >= X[X.length - 1]) {
			return Y[X.length - 1];
		} else if (x <= X[0]) {
			return Y[0];
		} else {
			for (uint256 i = X.length - 2; i >= 0; i--) {
				if (x > X[i]) {
					return Y[i] + ((Y[i + 1] - Y[i]) * (x - X[i])) / (X[i + 1] - X[i]);
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
